member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Api.ApiClient
member.summary: API client for communicating with the GGs server

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Api.AuthService
member.summary: Authentication service for user login and token management

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Elevation.IElevationBridge
member.summary: Contract for consent-gated elevation bridge. Provides discrete, audited privileged operations with declared intent, input contracts, and rollback plans. Never chains arbitrary commands; each action requires explicit declaration.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Elevation.IElevationBridge.ExecuteElevatedAsync(GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes an elevated operation with full audit trail and rollback support.
member.param: The elevation request with operation details

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Elevation.IElevationBridge.IsElevatedAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Checks if the current process is running with elevated privileges.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Elevation.IElevationBridge.ValidateRequestAsync(GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Validates an elevation request without executing it. Checks permissions, policy compliance, and input validation.
member.returns: Validation result with any issues found

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Elevation.IElevationBridge.RollbackAsync(GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationExecutionLog,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Rolls back a previously executed elevated operation.
member.param: The execution log from the original operation

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRequest.CorrelationId
member.summary: Correlation ID for tracing across systems.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRequest.OperationName
member.summary: Human-readable operation name for logging and consent UI.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRequest.RequiresRestart
member.summary: Whether this operation requires a system restart.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRequest.RequestedAtUtc
member.summary: Timestamp when the request was created.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRequest.RequestedBy
member.summary: User who requested the operation (for audit trail).

member.name: F:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRiskLevel.Low
member.summary: Low risk - read-only or easily reversible operations.

member.name: F:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRiskLevel.Medium
member.summary: Medium risk - configuration changes that can be rolled back.

member.name: F:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRiskLevel.High
member.summary: High risk - system-level changes that may require restart.

member.name: F:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRiskLevel.Critical
member.summary: Critical risk - operations that could affect system stability.

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationExecutionResult
member.summary: Result of an elevated operation execution.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationExecutionResult.ExitCode
member.summary: Exit code from the elevated process (0 = success).

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationExecutionResult.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Error message if the operation failed.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationExecutionResult.ExecutionLog
member.summary: Execution log for audit trail and rollback.

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationExecutionLog
member.summary: Execution log for audit trail and rollback support.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationExecutionLog.ChangeDetails
member.summary: Detailed changes made by the operation.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationExecutionLog.WasElevated
member.summary: Whether the operation was actually elevated.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationExecutionLog.MachineName
member.summary: Machine where the operation was executed.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationValidationResult.RequiresElevation
member.summary: Whether elevation is required for this operation.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Elevation.ElevationRollbackResult.OriginalRequestId
member.summary: The original request ID that was rolled back.

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Http.SecureHttpClientFactory
member.summary: Factory for creating secure HTTP clients

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Models.SystemInformation
member.summary: Comprehensive system information model for enterprise-grade hardware detection

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Models.UltraDeepDiagnosticsReport
member.summary: Ultra-deep diagnostics report containing expert-level Windows internals analysis

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider
member.summary: Defines the contract for deep system access capabilities. All operations respect privilege boundaries and consent requirements.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.GetWmiInventoryAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets WMI/CIM inventory and health data. Non-admin safe. Returns comprehensive hardware, driver, storage, network, power, and security status.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.SubscribeToEventLogsAsync(GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.EventLogSubscriptionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Subscribes to Windows Event Log channels. Non-admin safe for Application/System and most Operational channels.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.QueryEventLogsAsync(GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.EventLogQueryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Queries Event Log entries with filtering. Non-admin safe for accessible channels.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.StartEtwSessionAsync(GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.EtwSessionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Starts ETW (Event Tracing for Windows) session for user-mode providers. Kernel providers require elevation and explicit consent.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.CollectPerformanceDataAsync(GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.PerformanceDataRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Collects performance counter data (CPU, memory, disk, network, per-process). Non-admin safe.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.StartRegistryMonitorAsync(GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.RegistryMonitorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Monitors registry key for changes using RegNotifyChangeKeyValue. Non-admin safe for HKCU; HKLM requires appropriate permissions.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.QueryServicesAsync(GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ServiceQueryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Queries Windows services with detailed status and configuration. Non-admin safe for queries; modifications require elevation.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.GetNetworkInfoAsync(GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.NetworkInfoRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets network adapter information, DNS configuration, and socket state. Uses IP Helper APIs (GetAdaptersAddresses, GetExtendedTcpTable). Non-admin safe.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.StartCertificateMonitorAsync(GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.CertificateMonitorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Monitors X509 certificate stores (CurrentUser) for enrollment and trust changes. Non-admin safe for CurrentUser store.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.GetWindowsUpdateStatusAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets Windows Update status, history, and last error using WUAPI COM. Non-admin safe for queries; no forced scans without consent.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.GetPowerStorageInfoAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets power and storage information (battery, thermal, volume health). Uses powercfg integration and Storage WMI. Non-admin safe.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.RequestElevationConsentAsync(GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ElevationConsentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Requests consent-gated elevation for privileged operations. Returns elevation result with user decision and reason logging.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.ISystemAccessProvider.CheckPrivilegesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Checks current privilege level and capabilities.

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.WindowsUpdateResult
member.summary: Result of Windows Update status query.

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.SystemAccess.PowerStorageResult
member.summary: Result of power and storage information query.

member.summary: Validates if user has required license tier

member.summary: Validates scan areas based on license tier

member.summary: Tracks progress of system intelligence operations

member.summary: The type of a tweak, indicating the system area it affects.

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.SystemIntelligence.KnownOptimizer
member.summary: Third-party optimizer applications that can be detected

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.SystemIntelligence.ScanDepth
member.summary: Scan depth levels for different scanning operations

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.SystemIntelligence.ScanArea
member.summary: System areas that can be scanned

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.SystemIntelligence.ServiceAction
member.summary: Service actions that can be performed

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.SystemIntelligence.SystemIntelligenceService
member.summary: Main orchestration service for the System Intelligence Harvester feature Coordinates deep system scanning, tweak detection, and profile management

member.summary: Manages UAC privileges and elevation requirements

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ITweakModule
member.summary: Base interface for all tweak capability modules. Each module implements safe-by-default, powerful-on-consent operations with preflight validation, atomic apply, verify, and rollback capabilities.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ITweakModule.ModuleName
member.summary: Module name for logging and telemetry.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ITweakModule.PreflightAsync(GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TweakDefinition,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Validates whether the tweak can be applied without actually applying it. Checks existence, type, policy constraints, and permissions.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ITweakModule.ApplyAsync(GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TweakDefinition,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Applies the tweak atomically. Should be idempotent.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ITweakModule.VerifyAsync(GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TweakDefinition,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Verifies that the tweak was applied successfully.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ITweakModule.RollbackAsync(GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TweakApplicationLog,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Rolls back the tweak to its previous state.

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ReasonCodes
member.summary:
Standardized reason codes for telemetry, audit logging, and policy decisions. Format: CATEGORY.ACTION.Context.Detail
This provides stable, machine-readable codes for long-term analytics and compliance. All codes follow a hierarchical structure for easy filtering and aggregation.

member.name: F:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ReasonCodes.POLICY_WARN
member.summary: Policy warning issued but operation proceeded

member.name: F:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ReasonCodes.AUDIT_QUEUED
member.summary: Audit log queued for offline retry

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ReasonCodes.SanitizeForCode(System.String)
member.summary: Sanitizes a string for use in a reason code by removing invalid characters. Keeps only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ReasonCodes.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a reason code into its components. Returns (Category, Action, Context, Detail) or nulls if parsing fails.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ReasonCodes.IsSuccess(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a reason code indicates success.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ReasonCodes.IsPolicyDenial(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a reason code indicates a policy denial.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.ReasonCodes.IsValidationFailure(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a reason code indicates a validation failure.

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext
member.summary: Telemetry context that flows through all operations for distributed tracing and correlation. Implements Prompt 4 requirements: DeviceId + OperationId + CorrelationId with synchronized timestamps.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext.DeviceId
member.summary: Unique identifier for the device executing the operation. Stable across reboots and reinstalls.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext.OperationId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this specific operation instance. Generated once per operation and flows through all related activities.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext.CorrelationId
member.summary: Correlation identifier linking related operations together. Passed from the initiating request through all downstream operations.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext.InitiatedUtc
member.summary: Synchronized timestamp when the operation was initiated (UTC). Used for accurate time-series analysis and event ordering.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext.UserId
member.summary: User identifier if available (for audit trail).

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext.SessionId
member.summary: Session identifier if available (for grouping related operations).

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext.ParentOperationId
member.summary: Parent operation ID if this is a child operation. Used for building operation hierarchies.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext.Create(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new telemetry context with a new operation ID.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext.CreateChild
member.summary: Creates a child telemetry context that inherits correlation but has a new operation ID.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext.ToDictionary
member.summary: Converts the telemetry context to a dictionary for logging and tracing.

member.name: M:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TelemetryContext.ToString
member.summary: Returns a formatted string for logging.

member.name: T:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.EnhancedHeartbeatData
member.summary: Enhanced heartbeat data with comprehensive system health monitoring. Implements Prompt 4 requirements for detailed health telemetry.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.EnhancedHeartbeatData.WorkingSetBytes
member.summary: Working set size in bytes (memory used by the agent process).

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.EnhancedHeartbeatData.ThreadCount
member.summary: Number of threads in the agent process.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.EnhancedHeartbeatData.HandleCount
member.summary: Number of handles in the agent process.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.EnhancedHeartbeatData.OperationsExecuted
member.summary: Number of operations executed since last heartbeat.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.EnhancedHeartbeatData.OperationsSucceeded
member.summary: Number of operations succeeded since last heartbeat.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.EnhancedHeartbeatData.OperationsFailed
member.summary: Number of operations failed since last heartbeat.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.EnhancedHeartbeatData.OfflineQueueDepth
member.summary: Number of items in the offline queue.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.EnhancedHeartbeatData.HealthScore
member.summary: Health score (0-100, where 100 is perfect health).

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.EnhancedHeartbeatData.CustomMetrics
member.summary: Additional custom metrics as key-value pairs.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TweakApplicationLog.OperationId
member.summary: Unique operation identifier for this specific execution. Used for distributed tracing and correlation across systems.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TweakApplicationLog.CorrelationId
member.summary: Correlation identifier linking related operations together. Passed from the initiating request through all downstream operations.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TweakApplicationLog.InitiatedUtc
member.summary: Synchronized timestamp when the operation was initiated (UTC). Used for accurate time-series analysis and event ordering.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TweakApplicationLog.CompletedUtc
member.summary: Synchronized timestamp when the operation completed (UTC). Used for duration calculation and performance analysis.

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TweakApplicationLog.ReasonCode
member.summary: Standardized reason code for policy decisions and errors. Format: CATEGORY.ACTION.Context.Detail Examples: POLICY.DENY.ServiceStop.WinDefend, VALIDATION.FAILED.RegistryPath.Blocked

member.name: P:GGs.Shared.Tweaks.TweakApplicationLog.PolicyDecision
member.summary: Policy decision context for audit trail. Captures why an operation was allowed, denied, or modified.
